text:
Raskolnikov laughed, anger boiling beneath the surface. 

Pulcheria Alexandrovna shouted, “Expenses? The conductor brought our trunk for free!”

Dounia pleaded, “Enough, mother. Pyotr Petrovitch, please go!”

“I’m leaving, but listen,” he sneered. “I saved your reputation. I deserve gratitude.”

Razumihin leaped up. “Does the fellow want his head smashed?”

“You’re mean and spiteful!” Dounia yelled.

“Not a word! Leave now!” Raskolnikov commanded, stepping close. 

Pyotr Petrovitch stared, disbelief etched on his face.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov confronts Pyotr Petrovitch Luzhin, who arrogantly claims he deserves gratitude for disregarding public opinion about Dounia's reputation.
